column2: A basic labratory allowing you to brew simple potions. (Potions of Healing, Climbing and Comprehension).
A good quality labratory, allowing you to brew stronger potions. (Potions of Greater Healing, Resistance, Poison and Waterbreathing).
A high class labratory allowing you to brew the strongest potions. Beware, not for the weak! (Potion of Superior Healing, Clairvoyance, Dimunition, Strength, Gaseous Form, Heroism, Mind Reading).
